channel.title: CVE Feed for PLANEX COMMUNICATIONS INC. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PLANEX COMMUNICATIONS INC. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-45372|2024-09-26T13:38:09.590Z -- planex%20communications%20inc. -- mzk-dp300n
item.description: MZK-DP300N firmware versions 1.04 and earlier contains a cross-site request forger vulnerability. Viewing a malicious page while logging in to the web management page of the affected product may lead the user to perform unintended operations such as changing the login password, etc.

item.title: CVE-2024-45836|2024-09-26T13:37:20.761Z -- planex%20communications%20inc. -- cs-qr10
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in the web management page of PLANEX COMMUNICATIONS network cameras. If a logged-in user accesses a specific file, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user.

item.title: CVE-2024-30220|2024-08-02T01:25:03.326Z -- planex%20communications%20inc. -- mzk-mf300n
item.description: Command injection vulnerability in MZK-MF300N all firmware versions allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary command by sending a specially crafted request to a certain port.

item.title: CVE-2024-30219|2024-08-02T01:25:03.416Z -- planex%20communications%20inc. -- mzk-mf300n
item.description: Active debug code vulnerability exists in MZK-MF300N all firmware versions. If a logged-in user who knows how to use the debug function accesses the device's management page, an unintended operation may be performed.

item.title: CVE-2024-30219|2024-04-15T10:42:30.673Z -- planex%20communications%20inc. -- mzk-mf300n
item.description: Active debug code vulnerability exists in MZK-MF300N all firmware versions. If a logged-in user who knows how to use the debug function accesses the device's management page, an unintended operation may be performed.

item.description: Command injection vulnerability in MZK-MF300N all firmware versions allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary command by sending a specially crafted request to a certain port.

item.description: Command injection vulnerability in MZK-MF300N all firmware versions allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary command by sending a specially crafted request to a certain port.

item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in the web management page of PLANEX COMMUNICATIONS network cameras. If a logged-in user accesses a specific file, an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user.
